message.body: Cool! Let me know if ur up for a walk today or tomorrow.
I'm heading to NJ around 8 tonight but could go earlier. Tomorrow I might go to yoga around 4-6 but could go after this.
Today is out but I could do tomorrow. I have an appointment on ######### at 7:30 so it would have to be before that (the earlier the better)
Not sure if or how long I'll be at yoga. It is a new style that I'm just starting. Let's play it by ear.
OK. Sounds like the weather might be pretty lousy anyway. AGAIN
We'll keep our fingers crossed. Maybe we'll get lucky!
I don't think tonight is going to work. I have to be back at home by 7 to shower quickly before I head to my appointment and it sounds like that would be cutting it way too close for you after yoga
I'm actually not going to yoga but I think I'm going to walk ####### a lil later so it is a lil cooler for her. Let's take a raincheck.
OK. Yeah be careful, it's not humid but it is super hot or there!!
